title: Bold Serif Numbers
content:
Looking for a typeface with bold serif numbers similar in style to Bodoni. Going to be used as display type. Any suggestions?  
Thanks!
author: bnyc

comments.content: Pistilli Roman is nice, as is Cabernet, as is HFJ Didoni. While you're at the HFJ site, check out their "Number" font ... maybe you'll see something you like.

Hi Brian,  
 [ITC Bodoni Display Figures](http://web.archive.org/web/20120421233559/http:/www.stonetypefoundry.com/bodonidisplayfig.html). Not bold enough?

[Carousel](http://web.archive.org/web/20120421233559/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/elsner_flake/carousel/?sample_text=0123456789&sample_size=60), [Normande](http://web.archive.org/web/20120421233559/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/bitstream/normande_roman_ot/?sample_text=0123456789&sample_size=48), Firenze, [Stilla](http://web.archive.org/web/20120421233559/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=stilla&site=d&sample_text=0123456789&sample_size=48).  
F

I think m albright meant [HFJ Didot](http://web.archive.org/web/20120421233559/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/font_overview.php?productLineID=100004) and not HFJ Didoni

– _Malte_
